title: CLAUSE 1- AGE REQUIREMENTS
description:
Agreeing to these Terms of Service verifies that you are at the required age that your country constitutionally accepts as the age that can access the internet. If you are below the recognized adult age in your country and would like to use our website, seek assistance and permission from your parent or legal guardian after carefully reading the Terms together.

A parent or guardian that permits the child to use our services is solely responsible for the child's behaviour on the website and must know that is not excluded from our Terms of Service.

title: CLAUSE 2- OBEDIENCE AND MAXIMUM RESPECT
description:
We want to uphold a respectful atmosphere for everyone, which implies that you must obey these fundamental rules of conduct and behaviour.

Comply with applicable laws, that include; supervision, sanctions, penalties and human trafficking laws

Obey the rights of others, including the privacy and intellectual property rights of our website.

Abuse, intimidation, bullying, self-harm or harming others or threatening for instance, through misleading, misinforming, defrauding, illegally impersonating, defaming, harassing, mocking or stalking others is strictly prohibited.

Because we respect standard usage rules that other website owners stipulate in their website's protocol when we index the web to show you search results, we expect the same from you while using our services and so strictly don't allow you to abuse, harm, deter, interfere with or disrupt our services. For instance, you're not allowed to hack, use malware or spammers, bypass our system and protective criteria or use fraudulent and deceitful methods on our website.

Our service-specific additional terms and policies give extra details about ethical behaviour that everybody utilizing those services must follow. If you find that others aren’t obeying these rules, many of our services allow you to report misuse or abuse. Abuse of our Terms of Service will result in the immediate ending of your services on our website.

title: CLAUSE 3-ONLINE STORE AND WEBSITE USAGE
description: Each new item or tool which is added to the existing store shall be subject to the Terms of Service. You can examine the most recent version of the Terms of Service at your convenient time on this page. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes consists of acceptance of those changes.

description:
We retain the right to reject, deny or dismiss our services to anyone for any intention at any time.

You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve transmissions over various networks or changes to correspond and adapt to the technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfers over networks or gadgets.

description:

We shall not be liable to you or any third party for any adjustment, modification, transformation, price change, suspension or discontinuance of the Service.

description:

We have made every endeavour to exhibit as accurately as possible the colours and images of our products that appear on the online shop but cannot guarantee that your computer monitor or phone screen display of any colour will be accurate.

We retain the right to limit the quantities of any products or services that we offer. All descriptions of products or product pricing might change at any time without notice at our sole discretion.

We do not warrant that the quality of any products, services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be rectified.

We have the right to discontinue any product at any time. Any offer for any product or service made on this site is worthless where prohibited.

title: CLAUSE 7 - BILLING AND ACCOUNT INFORMATION
description:
It is our right to refuse any order you place with us. We may, in our sole discretion, limit or cancel quantities purchased per individual, per home or order. These restrictions may include orders placed by or under the same customer account, the same credit card or orders that use the same billing and shipping address.

If we make a change to or cancel an order, we may endeavour to notify you by contacting the e‑mail or billing address or phone number provided at the time the order was placed. We have the right to limit or prohibit orders that in our sole opinion, appear to be placed by dealers, brokers, resellers or distributors.

You agree to submit current, complete and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made at our online store.

You agree to submit current, complete and accurate purchase and account information for all purchases made at our online store.

For more details, please revisit our Returns Policy.

You admit and accept that we provide access to such tools without any verifications, representations, warranties or conditions of any kind and any endorsement. We shall have no liability emerging from or relating to your use of optional third-party tools.

We are likely to offer new services or features in the future on our website which might include new tools and services and shall be in line with our Terms of Service.

description:

We are not responsible for examining or evaluating the content or accuracy and we do not warrant and will not have any liability or responsibility for any third-party materials or websites, or any other materials, products, or services of third parties.

We are not responsible for any harm or damages related to the purchase or use of goods, services, resources, content, or any other transactions made in connection with any third-party websites.

Please check carefully the third-party's policies and practices and ensure that you understand them before you engage in any transaction. Complaints, claims, concerns, or questions regarding third-party products should be directed to the third party.

If at our request, you send certain specific submissions for instance contest entries or without a request from us, you send creative ideas, suggestions, proposals, plans, opinions or other materials whether online, by email or by postal mail, you agree that we may, at any time, without restriction edit, copy, publish distribute, translate and use in any medium any comments that you forward to us. We are and shall be under no obligation to maintain any comments in confidence, to pay compensation for any comments or to respond to any comments. 

We might but have no responsibility to, correct, amend, monitor, edit or remove content that we determine in our sole discretion are illegal, offensive, threatening, libellous, defamatory, pornographic, obscene or reprehensible or fails to observe any party’s intellectual property or these Terms of Service.

You agree that your comments will not violate any right of any third party, including copyright, trademark, privacy, personality or another personal and proprietary right.

You further agree that your comments will not contain libellous or otherwise unlawful, illegal, abusive or obscene material, or have any computer virus or other malware that could in any way affect the operation of the Service or any related website.

You may not use a false e‑mail address, pretend to be someone other than yourself, or otherwise mislead us or third-parties as to the origin of any comments. You are solely responsible for any comments you make and their accuracy.

We take no responsibility and assume no liability for any comments posted by you or any third party.

description: We might have services that are designed to allow you to upload, submit, store, send, receive or share your content on our website. description: Your submission of personal information through the website or store is regulated by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy.

We withhold the right to correct any errors, inaccuracies or omissions, and to change or update information or cancel orders if any information in the Service or on any related website is inaccurate at any time without prior notice (including after you have submitted your order)

No specified update or refresh date applied in the Service or on any related website should be taken to indicate that all information in the Service or on any related website has been modified or updated.

title: CLAUSE 16-  NOT PERMITTED AND PROHIBITED
description:
In addition to other prohibitions or restrictions as outlined in the Terms of Service, you are prohibited from using the site or its content:

(i)for any unlawful purpose

(ii) to ask others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts

(iii) to violate any international, federal, provincial or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances

(iv) to infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others

(v) to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate based on gender, discriminate based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, age, national origin and disability

(vi) to submit false or misleading information

(vii) to upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code that will or may be used in any way that will affect the functionality or operation of the Service or any related website, other websites or the Internet

(viii) to collect or track the personal information of others

(ix) to spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl or scrape

(x) for any obscene or immoral purpose

(xi) to interfere with or circumvent the security features of the Service or any related website, other websites, or the Internet. We reserve the right to terminate your use of the Service or any related website for violating any of the prohibited uses.

The obligations and liabilities of the parties incurred before the termination date shall survive the termination of this agreement for all purposes.

These Terms of Service are effective unless and until terminated by either you or us. You may terminate these Terms of Service at any time by notifying us that you no longer wish to use our Services, or when you cease using our site.

If in our sole judgment, you fail, or we suspect that you have failed to comply with any term or provision of these Terms of Service, we also may terminate this agreement at any time without notice and you will remain liable for all amounts due up to and including the date of termination or accordingly may deny you access to our Services.

description: These Terms of Service and any separate agreements whereby we provide you Services shall be governed by and construed by the laws of the USA. The place of jurisdiction is Wyoming

title: CLAUSE 24- FOR INQUIRIES
description: Inquiries or questions about the Terms of Service ought to be sent to us at support@ssebowa.org

title: CLAUSE 25- REFUND POLICY
description:
We have a one-month return policy, which implies you have 30 days after receiving your item to request a refund.

To be able to acquire a refund you’ll have to provide the receipt or evidence of purchase.

To start requesting a refund, you can contact us at support@ssebowa.org. If your refund is accepted, we will contact you and you'll be automatically paid back on your original payment method within 3-5 working days. Please remember it can take some time for your bank or credit card company to process the refund.

title: CLAUSE 26- SUMMARY OF TERMS
description:
According to the law, you have certain rights that can’t be limited by a contract like these Terms of service. These terms are in no way aimed at restricting those rights.

These Terms of Service indicate the techno-human relationship between you and Ssebowa. They don’t create any legal rights for other people, societies or organizations, even if others benefit from that relationship under them.

To make these terms easy to understand, we have selected examples from our services. But not all services mentioned may be accessible in your region.

If these terms clash with the service-specific additional terms, the additional terms will govern that service.

If it turns out that a particular term is not valid or enforceable, this will not affect any other terms.

If you violate these terms or the service-specific additional terms, and we don't take action right away, that doesn’t imply we're giving up any rights that we may have, such as taking action in the future.

We may update these terms and service-specific other terms; to reflect changes in our services or how we do business. For instance, we might add new services, features, technologies, pricing, or benefits (or remove old ones) for legal, regulatory or security reasons, or to prevent abuse or harm.

If we materially change these terms or service-specific additional terms, we’ll provide you with reasonable advance notice and the opportunity to review the changes, except when we launch a new service or feature, in urgent situations, such as curbing ongoing misuse, violation, abuse or responding to illegal requirements.

If you don’t agree to the new terms, you should remove your content and stop using the services. You can also end your agreement by stopping to use our services.

Apart from these terms, we also publish a Privacy Policy. Although it’s not part of these terms, we encourage you to read and understand better how we run our website
